author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
To fix memory leak reported in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/46901 
I need to backport more PRs, to make it consistent with master.
This PR replaces https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46942

This PR includes:
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46591
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45357
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45385
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46574

#### PR validation:
-

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
-
title: [14_0_X] Another backports to fix memory leak
